ComicInfo.Title: Death, Thy Name is Brother!
ComicInfo.Summary: Death, Thy Name is Brother!: Bennett Barlow helps Thor track down his brother, Damocles, who is using an unstable cobalt cannon to rob banks in the city.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:21:24. [Issue ID 31979]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Stilt-Man [Wilber Day] (un-named and not in costume),Damocles [Eric Barlow] (origin, death),Blastaar (un-named,cameo),Bennett Barlow,Thor
